title: The Dark Knight
simple_desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Inception
simple_desc: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Se7en
simple_desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
simple_desc: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Parasite
simple_desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Departed
simple_desc: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Léon: The Professional
simple_desc: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: The Prestige
simple_desc: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Usual Suspects
simple_desc: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Psycho
simple_desc: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: Rear Window
simple_desc: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

title: Woman in the Dunes
simple_desc: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

title: Joker
simple_desc: The rise of Arthur Fleck, from aspiring stand-up comedian and pariah to Gotham's clown prince and leader of the revolution.

title: Oldboy
simple_desc: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Memento
simple_desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
simple_desc: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Aliens
simple_desc: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

title: Come and See
simple_desc: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

title: The Lives of Others
simple_desc: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
simple_desc: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Kaithi
simple_desc: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

title: High and Low
simple_desc: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

title: Thani Oruvan
simple_desc: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

title: North by Northwest
simple_desc: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.
stars: ['Cary Grant', 'Eva Marie Saint', 'James Mason', 'Jessie Royce Landis']

title: Reservoir Dogs
simple_desc: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Vertigo
simple_desc: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

title: M
simple_desc: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Kantara
simple_desc: When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.

title: Double Indemnity
simple_desc: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Raatchasan
simple_desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
simple_desc: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

title: Maanaadu
simple_desc: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Jurassic Park
simple_desc: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: Shutter Island
simple_desc: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

title: No Country for Old Men
simple_desc: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
simple_desc: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Die Hard
simple_desc: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: The Sixth Sense
simple_desc: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

title: V for Vendetta
simple_desc: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

title: L.A. Confidential
simple_desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Chinatown
simple_desc: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: The Great Escape
simple_desc: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
simple_desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
simple_desc: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Tumbbad
simple_desc: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

title: Drishyam 2
simple_desc: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

title: Dial M for Murder
simple_desc: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
simple_desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Vikram Vedha
simple_desc: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Andhadhun
simple_desc: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

title: Yojimbo
simple_desc: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Z
simple_desc: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: The Wages of Fear
simple_desc: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
simple_desc: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine.

title: A Man Escaped
simple_desc: A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
simple_desc: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
simple_desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper and a drifter named Max.

title: Prisoners
simple_desc: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: Jaws
simple_desc: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Blade Runner
simple_desc: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Gone Girl
simple_desc: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

title: The Handmaiden
simple_desc: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: Logan
simple_desc: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: Room
simple_desc: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

title: Fargo
simple_desc: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Memories of Murder
simple_desc: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: Wild Tales
simple_desc: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

title: On the Waterfront
simple_desc: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

title: Persona
simple_desc: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

title: Amores Perros
simple_desc: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

title: Rebecca
simple_desc: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Third Man
simple_desc: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Sholay
simple_desc: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: Diabolique
simple_desc: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

title: Talvar
simple_desc: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

title: A Wednesday
simple_desc: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

title: Pink
simple_desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

title: Article 15
simple_desc: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

title: Rififi
simple_desc: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

title: The Tashkent Files
simple_desc: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

title: Sarfarosh
simple_desc: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

title: Safety Last!
simple_desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Kahaani
simple_desc: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

title: Omkara
simple_desc: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.
stars: ['Ajay Devgn', 'Kareena Kapoor', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Konkona Sen Sharma']

title: The Bandit
simple_desc: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

title: Thuppakki
simple_desc: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
simple_desc: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Blade Runner 2049
simple_desc: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Black Swan
simple_desc: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.

title: Donnie Darko
simple_desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

title: Sin City
simple_desc: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: Casino Royale
simple_desc: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

title: The Imitation Game
simple_desc: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

title: Akira
simple_desc: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: 12 Monkeys
simple_desc: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

title: JFK
simple_desc: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

title: Blood Diamond
simple_desc: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
simple_desc: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
simple_desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
simple_desc: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

title: Perfect Blue
simple_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: The Invisible Guest
simple_desc: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: The Night of the Hunter
simple_desc: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: High Noon
simple_desc: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

title: Infernal Affairs
simple_desc: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
stars: ['Andy Lau', 'Tony Leung Chiu-wai', 'Anthony Chau-Sang Wong', 'Eric Tsang']

title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
simple_desc: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

title: Wolfwalkers
simple_desc: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

title: Touch of Evil
simple_desc: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
simple_desc: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: Le Samouraï
simple_desc: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

title: Elite Squad
simple_desc: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

title: Sleuth
simple_desc: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

title: Sanjuro
simple_desc: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

title: Haider
simple_desc: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

title: Fail Safe
simple_desc: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

title: Elite Squad 2: The Enemy Within
simple_desc: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

title: Rome, Open City
simple_desc: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

title: The Blue Elephant
simple_desc: While trying to help an inmate at the mental hospital, a psychotherapist unravels mysteries he never thought existed.

title: Special 26
simple_desc: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

title: 1: Nenokkadine
simple_desc: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

title: Knives Out
simple_desc: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
stars: ['Daniel Craig', 'Chris Evans', 'Ana de Armas', 'Jamie Lee Curtis']

title: Mulholland Drive
simple_desc: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

title: True Romance
simple_desc: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

title: The Bourne Identity
simple_desc: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

title: In Bruges
simple_desc: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
simple_desc: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

title: Mystic River
simple_desc: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: Children of Men
simple_desc: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

title: The Big Sleep
simple_desc: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail and what might be love.

title: District 9
simple_desc: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

title: All the President's Men
simple_desc: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

title: In the Heat of the Night
simple_desc: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

title: Carlito's Way
simple_desc: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

title: Ghost in the Shell
simple_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: The Wrestler
simple_desc: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

title: Charade
simple_desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: The Raid 2
simple_desc: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

title: Notorious
simple_desc: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: Shoplifters
simple_desc: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders are united by loyalty, a penchant for petty theft and playful grifting. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

title: Rope
simple_desc: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
simple_desc: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

title: The Killing
simple_desc: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Strangers on a Train
simple_desc: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
simple_desc: A Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to tie the knot. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

title: Ugly
simple_desc: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

title: Elevator to the Gallows
simple_desc: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

title: Onibaba
simple_desc: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

title: In a Lonely Place
simple_desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: Battleship Potemkin
simple_desc: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

title: Nine Queens
simple_desc: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

title: The Red Circle
simple_desc: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

title: The Big Heat
simple_desc: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
simple_desc: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Baby
simple_desc: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

title: Vishwaroopam
simple_desc: When a classical dancer's suspecting wife sets an investigator behind him, a series of violent events are triggered, revealing his real identity and connection to a darker world.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: The Batman
simple_desc: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: Get Out
simple_desc: A young African-American visits his White girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Dunkirk
simple_desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: Apocalypto
simple_desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

title: The Hateful Eight
simple_desc: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'Kurt Russell', 'Jennifer Jason Leigh', 'Walton Goggins']

title: Nightcrawler
simple_desc: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

title: Skyfall
simple_desc: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

title: Hot Fuzz
simple_desc: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

title: Taken
simple_desc: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: The Untouchables
simple_desc: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.
stars: ['Kevin Costner', 'Sean Connery', 'Robert De Niro', 'Charles Martin Smith']

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
simple_desc: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

title: The Fugitive
simple_desc: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Captain Phillips
simple_desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: I Saw the Devil
simple_desc: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: To Have and Have Not
simple_desc: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Serenity
simple_desc: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

title: Thirteen Lives
simple_desc: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

title: Misery
simple_desc: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

title: Gattaca
simple_desc: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: The King of Comedy
simple_desc: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
simple_desc: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

title: The Conversation
simple_desc: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: The Insider
simple_desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

title: The Best Offer
simple_desc: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Dawn of the Dead
simple_desc: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

title: Night of the Living Dead
simple_desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

title: Mississippi Burning
simple_desc: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Changeling
simple_desc: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when they try to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: Mother
simple_desc: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

title: Gaslight
simple_desc: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the home rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

title: The Day of the Jackal
simple_desc: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
simple_desc: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

title: The Chaser
simple_desc: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

title: Ninja Scroll
simple_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

title: The White Ribbon
simple_desc: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

title: Frankenstein
simple_desc: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
simple_desc: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
simple_desc: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

title: The Killer
simple_desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

title: Badla
simple_desc: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
simple_desc: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
simple_desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: Ex Machina
simple_desc: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

title: Ocean's Eleven
simple_desc: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Wind River
simple_desc: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
simple_desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

title: Deliverance
simple_desc: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

title: Zodiac
simple_desc: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: Primal Fear
simple_desc: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: The Game
simple_desc: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

title: Blue Velvet
simple_desc: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: A Few Good Men
simple_desc: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: Coraline
simple_desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: Training Day
simple_desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Man on Fire
simple_desc: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Argo
simple_desc: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

title: The Machinist
simple_desc: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
simple_desc: The story of 7 people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
simple_desc: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Crash
simple_desc: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: Halloween
simple_desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: First Blood
simple_desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: Gravity
simple_desc: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: The Boondock Saints
simple_desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.
stars: ['Willem Dafoe', 'Sean Patrick Flanery', 'Norman Reedus', 'David Della Rocco']

title: Road to Perdition
simple_desc: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Dirty Harry
simple_desc: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

title: Serpico
simple_desc: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Goldfinger
simple_desc: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: The Name of the Rose
simple_desc: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

title: The French Connection
simple_desc: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: Lucky Number Slevin
simple_desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

title: Paprika
simple_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: Sorcerer
simple_desc: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

title: Run Lola Run
simple_desc: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: Black Book
simple_desc: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

title: The Man from Nowhere
simple_desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

title: Miller's Crossing
simple_desc: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: The Vanishing
simple_desc: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

title: Never Look Away
simple_desc: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: Cape Fear
simple_desc: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
